item.title: 美国称若波兰对大型科技企业征税将采取报复行动
item.description: 美国驻华沙特使周一警告说，如果波兰对大型科技公司征税，波兰将面临后果。【原文：Poland will face consequences if it introduces a levy on large technology companies, the incoming US envoy to Warsaw warned on Monday, as the spat between the two allies escalated.】

item.title: 加拿大原油暴涨预示关税担忧正在减弱
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对美国进口加拿大石油征收关税的担忧正在减弱，因为征税开始日期不断推迟，使得当地原油价格走强。【原文：Concern about US President Donald Trump’s threats to impose tariffs on US imports of Canadian oil is waning as the duties’ start date keeps getting pushed back, strengthening local crude prices.】

item.title: 美国顶级公用事业公司称天然气仅能满足部分电力需求
item.description: 美国最大的公用事业公司、风能和太阳能发电的头号开发商 NextEra Energy 公司认为，以天然气为燃料的发电厂只能满足预计到本十年末前所未有的电力需求增长的一小部分。【原文：NextEra Energy Inc., the biggest US utility and No. 1 developer of wind and solar generation, believes power plants fueled by natural gas can meet only a sliver of the unprecedented electricity demand growth forecast through the end of the decade.】

item.title: 法国帮助摩尔多瓦应对外国网络威胁
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）签署了一份意向书，以促进法国追踪外国数字干扰的机构与摩尔多瓦同行之间的合作。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron signed a letter of intent to promote cooperation between the country’s agency that tracks foreign digital interference and its Moldovan counterpart.】

item.title: 中国 "马努斯 "公司在打造人工智能代理的竞赛中挑战美国科技公司
item.description:
一些早期用户对该产品的功能充满热情；而另一些用户则抱怨该产品耗时太长，而且会崩溃。【原文：

Some early users were enthusiastic about the product’s capabilities; others complained it took too long and crashed.

】

item.title: 苹果公司准备对 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 的软件进行重大改革
item.description: 苹果公司正在准备进行公司历史上最引人注目的软件大改革，旨在为新一代用户改造 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 的界面。【原文：Apple Inc. is preparing one of the most dramatic software overhauls in the company’s history, aiming to transform the interface of the iPhone, iPad and Mac for a new generation of users.】

item.title: 尼日利亚与丹格特公司就延长石油销售合同进行谈判
item.description: 尼日利亚正在与丹格特炼油厂（Dangote Refinery）商谈延长以当地货币向该厂（非洲最大的炼油厂）出售原油的合同。【原文：Nigeria is in talks with the Dangote Refinery to extend a contract to sell crude in local currency to the plant, the biggest in Africa.】

item.title: 矿业集团称巴西的繁文缛节正在 "冷却 "投资
item.description: 全球对重要矿产日益增长的需求可能会给巴西带来福音，但巴西前环境主管、现任巴西最大矿业集团负责人表示，严格的许可程序阻碍了发展。【原文：The growing global demand for critical minerals could be a boon for Brazil, but the strict licensing process is holding back development, says the country’s former environmental chief who now heads its largest mining industry group.】

item.title: ESM负责人称美国推动加密货币威胁欧盟战略自主权
item.description: 据一位欧盟高级官员称，特朗普政府对加密货币的支持可能会损害欧洲的货币自主权，从而支持数字欧元。【原文：The Trump administration’s support of crypto currencies could hurt Europe’s monetary autonomy, supporting the case for a digital euro, according to a top EU official.】

item.title: 卢比奥说：乌克兰会议旨在澄清可能的让步
item.description: 美国国务卿马可-卢比奥说，本周在沙特阿拉伯举行的美乌会议旨在帮助澄清在推动与俄罗斯停火的过程中有可能做出哪些让步，他淡化了取得重大突破的可能性。【原文：This week’s US-Ukraine meeting in Saudi Arabia is meant to help clarify what concessions might be possible in the push toward a ceasefire with Russia, Secretary of State Marco Rubio said, playing down the possibility of a major breakthrough.】

item.title: 快钱交易员抛售美股的情况似乎有所缓解
item.description: 据华尔街银行称，在经历了数周的市场大幅下跌之后，一批受到密切关注的投资者抛售美股的情况似乎有所缓解。【原文：Selling of US stocks by a closely watched group of investors appears to be easing after weeks of steep market losses, according to Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 捷克总理敦促反对党支持增加国防开支
item.description: 捷克总理彼得-菲亚拉呼吁反对党支持增加国防开支，因为地缘政治风险已成为议会选举前一个有争议的竞选议题。【原文：Czech Prime Minister Petr Fiala called on the opposition to support higher defense spending as geopolitical risks become a contentious campaign issue before parliamentary elections.】

item.title: 欧盟救助基金负责人称市场更青睐联合债务用于防御
item.description: 欧洲稳定机制常务董事皮埃尔-格拉梅格纳（Pierre Gramegna）表示，市场认为，增加国防开支最好是通过欧盟联合借贷，而不是扩大单个国家的债务负担。【原文：Markets believe that additional outlays for defense are better served by joint European Union borrowing instead of expanding individual countries’ debt load, according to European Stability Mechanism Managing Director Pierre Gramegna.】

item.title: 弗兰岑出任首席执行官后，EQT任命私人资本联席主管
item.description: EQT AB 任命 Bert Janssens 和 Eric Liu 为欧洲和北美地区私人资本联席主管，此前 Per Franzen 已就任该收购公司的最高领导职位。【原文：EQT AB appointed Bert Janssens and Eric Liu as co-heads of private capital in Europe and North America, following Per Franzen’s accession to take on the top role to lead the buyout firm.】

item.title: 佩特罗称哥伦比亚应购买卡塔尔天然气以抵制低廉价格
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）表示，国有的 Ecopetrol SA 公司应从卡塔尔进口天然气，以实现天然气供应商的多样化并降低消费者的价格。【原文：Colombian President Gustavo Petro said state-owned Ecopetrol SA should import natural gas from Qatar to diversify suppliers and cut prices for consumers.】

item.title: 与凯茜-伍德有关联的 ETF 公司 Emerge Canada 涉嫌违反证券法
item.description: 据安大略省证券监管机构称，以销售凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）广受欢迎的交易所交易基金多伦多上市版本而闻名的投资公司 Emerge Canada Inc.【原文：Emerge Canada Inc., an investment firm known for selling Toronto-listed versions of Cathie Wood’s popular exchange-traded funds, has allegedly violated securities laws, according to Ontario’s securities regulator.】

item.title: 意大利提出 2,000 亿欧元投资计划以利用私人资金
item.description: 意大利计划提出一种新的金融工具，通过欧盟和成员国的担保，为战略防御和航空航天项目调动数千亿欧元的私人资本。【原文：Italy plans to propose a new financial vehicle to mobilize hundreds of billions of euros of private capital for strategic defense and aerospace projects via European Union and member state guarantees.】

item.title: Beacon Roofing 正与 QXO 洽谈潜在的 110 亿美元交易
item.description: Beacon Roofing Supply Inc. 在拒绝了 QXO Inc.【原文：Beacon Roofing Supply Inc. is in talks to be bought by QXO Inc. for about $11 billion including debt after rejecting an earlier takeover approach.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价暴跌，华尔街重新审视销量预期
item.description: 随着华尔街分析师开始下调汽车交付量预期，特斯拉公司股价有望创下 2020 年以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Tesla Inc. shares are on track for their steepest drop since 2020 as Wall Street analysts begin to slash their estimates for vehicle deliveries.】

item.title: 美国农业部称三月农作物报告将权衡特朗普关税
item.description: 一份备受关注的作物报告将于周二发布，作为全球玉米、大豆和其他农产品预测的一部分，该报告将把现有的贸易关税考虑在内。【原文：A closely watched crop report due Tuesday will take existing trade tariffs into account as part of global forecasts for the world’s corn, soybeans and other farm products.】

item.title: Galderma 支持者提供瑞士护肤品巨头 6.3% 的股份
item.description: 瑞士护肤品集团 Galderma Group AG 的股东将出让该集团 6.3% 的股份。【原文：Shareholders of Galderma Group AG are offering a 6.3% stake in the Swiss skincare group.】

item.title: 经济衰退警钟长鸣，短期债券 ETF 吸金数十亿
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普的经济政策引发衰退担忧和股市溃败之际，寻求安全藏身之地的投资者正将资金投入超短头债券交易所交易基金。【原文：Investors looking for a safe place to hide are shoveling money into ultra-short bond exchange-traded funds as Donald Trump’s economic policies stoke recessionary concerns and a stock-market rout.】

item.title: 秘鲁主要铜矿商在关税威胁下准备好了美国代表团
item.description: 在特朗普政府宣布对铜征收关税的计划后，秘鲁正计划派代表团与美国官员会面，这可能会影响到秘鲁这一南美国家最大的出口产品。【原文：Peru is planning to send a delegation to meet with US officials after the Trump administration announced plans to introduce copper tariffs that may affect the South American nation’s biggest export product.】

item.title: 卡尼在渥太华开始工作，大选鼓声日益响亮
item.description: 马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）开始为迅速接任加拿大总理一职打下基础，在自由党成员推选他为新领导人后，立法者和内阁部长们周一举行了重要会议。【原文：Mark Carney began laying the groundwork to take over quickly as Canada’s prime minister, with lawmakers and cabinet ministers holding key meetings Monday after Liberal Party members chose him as their new leader.】

item.title: 迈克尔-珀尔夫斯谈如何进行欧洲大宗商品交易
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: Blackstone 私人信贷间隔基金获美国证券交易委员会批准
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会周一批准了 Blackstone Inc. 最新的私人信贷基金，该基金旨在为散户投资者提供私人持有资产的投资机会，其流动性高于许多同类基金。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday approved Blackstone Inc.’s newest private credit fund, which aims to give retail investors exposure to privately held assets with more liquidity than many comparable vehicles.】

item.title: 特朗普的贸易威胁开始冲击加拿大信贷市场
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）之间的关税对峙使加拿大公司债券的销售在过去一周里放缓至涓涓细流，因为投资者要求更高的溢价来持有卢比债券。【原文：The tariff throwdown between Donald Trump and Justin Trudeau has slowed Canadian corporate bond sales to a trickle over the past week as investors demand a higher premium to hold loonie debt.】

item.title: 安大略省将明尼苏达州、密歇根州和纽约州的电价提高 25
item.description: 加拿大一个向美国出口电力的省份周一将三个州的电价提高了 25%，以报复唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税。【原文：A Canadian province that exports electricity to the US raised power prices for three states by 25% on Monday in retaliation for President Donald Trump’s tariffs.】

item.title: 英国统计局挑战交易商，维持早上 7 点的发布时间
item.description: 英国的关键经济数据将继续在上午 7 点发布，这对希望统计局恢复到疫情爆发前上午 9 点 30 分常态的交易员和投资者来说是一个打击。【原文：Key UK economic data will continue to be released at 7 a.m., a blow to traders and investors who wanted the statistics office to revert to the pre-pandemic norm of 9.30 a.m.】

item.title: 经济衰退警钟长鸣，股市上涨势头迅猛
item.description: 两年来，美国股市几乎直线上升。短短几周内，这种情况就发生了翻天覆地的变化，随着股市下挫的加剧，华尔街正在思考它的终点在哪里。【原文：For two years, US stocks went virtually straight up. In a matter of weeks, that’s been turned upside down, and as the equities selloff intensifies Wall Street is wondering where it stops.】
